description:
This course is not for people looking to earn some extra cash. This course is meant for Entrepreneurs who want to make some real money!

This course will teach you how to have a portfolio of one Million Dollars ($1,000,000) with just 50 clients and without investing a dime from your own pocket toward portfolio!

This course is a step by step guide on a Home Based Debt Settlement or Debt Relief service. This Course covers every aspect of the business: From what is Debt Settlement to what you will need to start, how to start, how to run it successfully and continually grow and make a substantial amount of money.

This course provides a combination of Audio, Video & Text base Lectures along with documents, templates and forms needed.

The Course has a combination of over 30 Lectures.

If you have an Entrepreneurial Zest and believe in yourself to be capable of handling and sustaining a rapid growing business then you should take this Course.
title: Home Based Debt Settlement/Debt Relief Business
